Title: Kiraware Mono no Rasu
Description: ['A detergent container, vinyl bag, and tar balls end up in the sea. A goddess fuses the items and gives it the power of life and some magic. Together they try to help stop pollution of the sea.']
Related: ['Prequel: Midori no Kuni no Otomodachi: Koeda-chan', 'Other: Koeda-chan CMs']
